title: 10 Delightful Instagram Filters for Halloween 2020
description: Want to add some Halloween chills to your Instagram stories? Need to make your costume unforgettable with AR? Here are 10 Halloween themed Instagram filters for you!
intro: Looking to bring some Halloween chills to your Instagram story? Want to enhance your costume with a little augmented reality? Here are 10 awesome Halloween filters for Instagram to enhance your feed this year.

filters.name: WitchByAna
filters.author: Ana
filters.description: Need to cast a spell on someone? While this filter guarantees you'll look like you can cast a spell, I don't think there's any guarantee that your spell will work. But it's worth a try.

filters.name: Creepy Clown
filters.author: Marc Wakefield
filters.description: What is Halloween without a creepy clown? And who doesn't have a friend who isn't terrified of clowns? Maybe you're that friend? Either way, this is the filter for that friend (or you).

filters.name: dark butterflies
filters.author: Julia Roga
filters.description: Toning it down a bit from the creepy clown is the "dark butterflies" filter from Julia. While it doesn't scream Halloween, with the right costume or outfit it can definitely add a little flair to your look.

filters.name: Halloween
filters.author: Ministry XR
filters.description: Need another creepy look? How about no eyes? Ministry XR has you covered.

filters.name: ROBOTFACE
filters.author: Roy
filters.description: Turn yourself into a Terminator-looking robot, complete with face transformation! Your mom might not look at you the same after you send her this.

filters.name: masquerade
filters.author: Galina
filters.description: Add an air of mystery to your costume with a masquerade mask. It may not hide your identity, but it definitely looks cool.

filters.name: Spider Eyes
filters.author: Rachel
filters.description: Eight eyes are better than two, isn't that how the saying goes? Tap into your inner arachnid with this filter to give you spider vision.

filters.name: Deface
filters.author: Luke Hurd
filters.description: This isn't the only filter out there that removes your face, but the extra effect of an infrared night-vision camera and flickering lines elevate this filter to the next level.

filters.name: Alien Disguise
filters.author: Craig Lewis
filters.description: Did things get a little out of hand when you raided Area 51? Did the aliens get a hold of you and possess your body? Oh, it was just me.

filters.name: cute pumpkin
filters.author: Sasha
filters.description: And let's finish this list off with something a little more cute, but still with some Halloween spirit.
